com.paco.java.subway

Class Intersection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paco.java.subway.Node
      • com.paco.java.subway.Intersection

  • public class Intersection
extends Node
    class Interaction : This is a specialization of the Node class. This specialization represents an intersection holding multiple (more than 2) links. From a functional perspective, this is the more stable of the Node class because the behavior of this (Intersection) Node doesn't change depending on the context...
    Author:
    Pascal

    • Constructor Detail

      • Intersection

        public Intersection(Node oOldNode,
            NodeLink oLink)
        This constructor transform a regular Node into an Intersection. Doing so, means creating IntersecLink type links between this Node and LeafNode or other Intersection type Node
        Parameters:
        oOldNode - A non null Node containing all the original information of the Node
        oLink - The link that needs to be added to oOldNode in order to transform it into an Intersection type Node...

    • Method Detail

      • AddNextLink

        public Node AddNextLink(NodeLink oLink)
        Description copied from class: Node
        This function integrate a link within a Node but will also redefin the Node if need be If the Node has more than 2 Links, it automatically becomes an Intersection Node. If the NOde only has 1 Link it becomes a Leaf Node (Exception is the first IOriginNode)
        Overrides:
        AddNextLink in class Node
        Parameters:
        oLink - : The Link that needs to be added to the Node
        Returns:
        : The Node either as a normal NOde or as an INtersection

      • AddXRoad

        public void AddXRoad(IntersecLink oLink)
        This method creates a specialize NodeLink called IntersecLink which links an Intersection class with either another Intersection class or with a NodeLeaf class
        Parameters:
        oLink - a non null IntersecLink link which establishes links between Intersection and NodeLeaf Node types

      • SwitchLink

        public void SwitchLink(IntersecLink oLink1,
              IntersecLink oLink2)
        This method will remove oLink1 from the Paths and add oLink2 to the Crossroad List
        Parameters:
        oLink1 - A non null IntersecLink linking to the old LeafNode
        oLink2 - A non null IntersecLink linking to the new Intersection node

      • SearchXNode

        public INodeLinker SearchXNode(INodeLinker oLinker,
                      Intersection oXNode)
        This method will try to link 2 Intersection type nodes together while keeping the smallest path in static object Pathfinder.RESULT
        Parameters:
        oLinker - The link between the 2 Intersection Nodes we are considering
        oXNode - The Intersection node we are looking for
        Returns:
        an update of the NodeLinker object oLinker
